head: PRIVATE SHOWINGS AVAIL-PENTHOUSE FLAT-VICTORIAN MANSION, CIRCA 1898
post: *** PRIVATE SHOWINGS AVAILABLE - CALL RICHARD AT (510) 502-4885 IF INTERESTED TO MAKE AN APPOINTMENT FOR A PRIVATE SHOWING *** - THIS FLAT HAS A UNIQUE TOP FLOOR PLAN - Available for Rent: 1657 Hayes Street, #4, San Francisco Size: Four Rooms, 1 Bath Top Floor Flat (There are only three units in the building) Rent: $3,195 per month. Security Deposit: 1.25 x 1 month rent Parking: A private garage will be available for one car and possible storage, for additional monthly fees. Description: This top floor flat is located in a former mini-mansion with a formal lobby and a museum quality engraved entry door. The buildings Mansaard roof forms interesting A-frame-type angles in almost every room of this top floor flat. There are beautifully refinished soft pine floors throughout. This unique top floor level flat features a spacious living room, which is sunny and bright, creating a cheery atmosphere. The large master bedroom, 20 x 8, can easily accommodate a king-sized bed. In addition, there is a large bay window dormer, 6 x 6, which could accommodate your office. You can decide whether to have a formal dining room or a second bedroom, 11 x 8, or have the alternative of having both, whenever you wish, by way of three fabric sliding Soge screens. The unit has an eat-in kitchen, big enough to do some serious cooking, with enough room for a table and chairs. The bathroom has a unique smallish claw foot tub with a shower, which is completely workable, and has a wonderful wall of mirrors. The back stairs lead to a large fenced-in backyard facing south, which covers a larger area than the mansion itself on the property. The backyard, about 90 x 25, is set up for an active vegetable garden, community outdoor entertainment area and just wholesome outdoor enjoyment and living, and is excellent for gardening or just enjoying the year round sun. The unit has 8 ceilings and retains heat well. The overall atmosphere is so sunny and bright, with the many numerous windows facing in all directions, that you are just going to love it!!!. Location: What a great neighborhood! Not only is it located just a few blocks from one of the nicest parks around (GGP Panhandle), it also has a nice convenient grocery store down the street, between Central Avenue and Lyon Street., and a great little coffee café with tables and chairs, a half block away on Central Avenue. Local transportation is right outside the front door! This unit is close to every convenience, including USF, Masonic Boulevard, Trader Joes, etc. The nearest cross street is Lyon Street. This flat is a great find! You need to come to the Open House and make yourself at home. Try it on for size and see if it fits. We will be looking for you.............. Contact: Call Richard at (510) 502-4885 and leave a voice mail message and he will call you back directly or call the business office and leave a message on our office answering machine for someone to call you back, at either (510) 352-0410, or (510) 352-2334, or send a fax with questions to our office at (510) 663-9401. head: Quiet retreat in a private setting
post: This delightful two-bedroom, one-bath cottage in Vallejo has wonderful indoor and outdoor spaces. There are hardwood floors in the living and dining rooms, and w/w carpeting in the bedrooms. The updated kitchen has a dishwasher, gas range/oven and a home-office nook. There is a separate laundry room. Refrigerator, washer & dryer are included. The living room has high ceilings with recessed lighting and a ceiling fan. There is a lovely landscaped and secluded front yard with a pond and bench; a rear patio and spacious yard for outdoor entertaining. An extra long driveway provides plenty of off-street parking and can accommodate 2-3 vehicles. House has a new roof and newer furnace, plus many dual paned windows that provide energy efficiency. The yards are nicely landscaped and are on an automatic sprinkler system. This home offers privacy and convenient access to major freeways and the Ferry Terminal.

post: AVAILABLE MAY 31, 2013 FOR MINIMUM OF 1 MONTH. The perfect home base for your work or vacation! This cozy apartment is walking distance from San Franciscos financial district and just one block from North Beachs famous restaurants. This is a great neighborhood, walking distance to everything with insanely fast Internet. Comes with a pull-out sofa that converts to a queen-sized bed. If its R&R; youre after, youll appreciate the amazing custom kitchen, equipped by a Cordon-Blue trained chef, the comfy couch, and the big screen TV with all the usual cable channels. If you feel the need to be active, try the XBOX. If you insist on leaving the great indoors, try a drink on the roof deck at sunset to start with. If you get hungry, North Beach is just half a block. And if you insist on going into work, the financial district is a nice 10 minute walk. We didnt just make the place comfy either. We made it greener. Most lights are low power LEDs, the appliances are all energy-star rated, and the hot water heater is a high efficiency, continuous flow heater that combines energy efficiency with a literally unlimited capacity. The only limit on your time in the shower will be your conscience. One parking spot for a compact car and available on a first-come, first-served basis. NO smoking and NO pets!

head: FULLY FURNISHED Brick Walled Rental
post: AVAILABLE May 4 to July 18, 2013 and anytime after September 23, 2013 for Short- and Long-Term Stay MINIMUM 1 MONTH - Parking Included This is a magnificent modern loft in a converted industrial building. Located across the street from the new San Francisco baseball park and the main city train station, this place is perfect for work in the city, commuting down to Silicon Valley, or having a fantastic bay area vacation. Inside this spacious, modern loft you can relax, work, or entertain. With blazing fast wireless Internet (50 megabits), a large desk, printer, scanner, and copier, youll find the loft much more productive than your office. This loft is luxuriously furnished in a contemporary style and decorated with original artwork, antiques, and thick woolen carpets from New Zealand. Distractions from work include two flat screen TVs with premium cable TV channels and a gourmet kitchen with Bosch appliances, granite counters, all equipped down to the right details by a Cordon-Bleu-trained chef. A Bosch washer/dryer provides personal convenience, but a dry cleaner is located within half a city block. The neighborhood is loaded with amazing restaurants in unique industrial spaces, not to mention San Franciscos best night clubs. In the morning, you can sleep it off or take a jog along the Embarcadero. NO smoking and NO pets

I cut those rents till we had a queue of drooling prospects hanging out of our door waving checks.  Weve got just a few of those giveaway-priced, stunning apartment homes left.  You can save hundreds (yes, thats plural) of dollars a month over other comparable apartment communities in our area.  That could be an extra car payment, or a family vacation!  We offer the ultimate in comfort and elegance, well-appointed with wood-burning fireplaces and spacious floorplans.  Stunning landscaping includes fountains, bridges, & lakes, and beautiful Laurel Creek Park is across the street.  The manicured common areas have a sparkling pool, heated spa, and clubhouse. Theres an on-site laundry facility. Conveniently close to the I-80 freeway, good neighbors, attentive management, and a great location in a primarily single family residential area near schools and shopping.  Look at the pictures on their website and youll see what an incredible deal youre getting!  And when you visit us, pay no attention to the overhead swarm of flying pigs.  Theyre perfectly harmless.  Call 707-428-3465 to schedule a tour. Bring your umbrella and your skillet (for the flying bacon). Please mention Ad Code MV34 and check out: *No Section 8!*

head: Experience the ocean waves just steps away from could be your new home
post: You cant get much closer to the ocean then 301 3rd in the heart of Pacifica CA. $3000 per month with unobstructed views of the ocean from both bedrooms we do not expect this home to be available for very long. This 2 bed 2 bath home is ideally situated on the corner of 3rd and Dalberg and comes with a fully fenced yard. It is expected that this home will be available for occupancy sometime in late July or early August. Month to month rentals and pet friendly environment are features that make our park truly unique. This home features a modern kitchen that comes equipped with tiled counter tops a refrigerator, gas range with microwave hood, dishwasher, stainless steel sink and garbage disposal. With a dark cherry laminate hardwood floors and a fully fenced yard it is perfect for small pets . A full size washer and gas dryer, gas central heat, duel pane windows, with lots of cabinets and ocean views from both bedrooms are just a few of the amenities. Imagine falling asleep to the gentle sound of the surf, and waking to the cool kiss of ocean mist. All of this in a wonderful community featuring our newly renovated Club House with full kitchen and hardwood dining tables with matching chairs. Join us for friendly conversation, or one of our game nights. Our clubhouse features and old fashioned brick fireplace that is perfect for warming up after a swim in our pool. Our common areas are not so common as we have a BBQ area near the Club House kitchen, full restrooms and showers as well as a small Laundromat. Whether you are young or just young at heart, we welcome you to our community at Pacific Skies Estates. For further information please contact Stephe or Charlene at (650) 355-4001 or on the web at JKester@aol.com . Our office hours are 9 AM to 4 PM 7 days a week. Our park is located at 1300 Palmetto Ave. Thank you and we look forward to seeing you.

head: Top floor flat in the hills of Noe Valley
post: Top floor flat available in a two-unit building located in the hills of Noe Valley on 24th Street (between Fountain and Grand View). The unit is on a steep hill, and offers beautiful views of the city with great natural light. The neighborhood is quiet and peaceful and within walking distance to all of the shops, restaurants, public transportation that 24th street has to offer. There are two bedrooms and one bath. The master bedroom has a big closet and loft space you can use for a bed or as a reading nook. There are vaulted ceilings with exposed beams, skylights in the kitchen and bathroom, original hardwood floors, and built-in bookshelves. The apartment comes with a one car garage (with additional storage space) and there is also plenty of street parking (no permit required). There is a shared backyard, a front-loading washer and dryer that is free to use, and an additional storage room that is shared for both units. Available July 15. for a one-year lease. One months rent + one months security deposit required at move in. Tenant pays water and garbage. Please email for questions or to make an appointment to see.

You will be responsible for the day-to-day maintenance of 14 residential units, the common areas, and exterior of the premises. In addition, you will need to take on small projects to help our crew finish renovations in a timely manner. You will be signing a lease for $1,795 a month for the apartment. You will pay rent each month for your apartment. At the end of each month you will receive a check for your management services for $600. Tenants from the building will not directly contact you for maintenance issues, but instead report all issues to the management company. The management company will then contact you for appropriate repairs. If the repair is beyond your scope of work, our maintenance staff will take care of the issue. This is not an employment position. You will be acting as an independent contractor. As such, you will be responsible for your own scheduling, provision of any necessary tools, etc. You will be paid a monthly fee for your services. As an independent contractor, you will be responsible for your own income reporting and you will not be entitled to unemployment benefits should the contract be terminated. The upstairs is well laid out, but the most impressive room is the enormous master bedroom which has a lovely view of the neighborhood. The master bathroom sports two sinks with granite counter tops. The unique layout of this home gives it an extremely open feel and would be a perfect fit for any large group. The wonderful Delta de Anza Regional Trail is right about the corner. Raleys Shopping Center, Sutter Delta Medical Center, Chichibu Park, and Sutter Elementary School are very close. Also nearby are Antioch Community Park, Antioch Municipal Reservoir, and Lone Tree Golf Course and Event Center. This apartment has built-in soundshield that thankfully keep outdoor sounds outdoors. The closet space is outstanding. There is a large private deck with this unit, great for plants, entertaining, patio furniture, or a BBQ. This is a well-kept corner building in a great neighborhood. head: One Hawthorne: Furnished or Unfurnished, Avail July
post: One Hawthorne: 645 Howard Street #17F When your new home is at One Hawthorne, you have one of the most commanding views of San Francisco. From Twin Peaks to Sutro Tower across the city skyline to the top of the SF MOMA--your new outlook is nothing less than simply spectacular. In this corner 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom home, you may choose to enjoy the views from the comfort of your couch or al fresco on your balcony or terrace. Either way, the net effect is nothing less than transformative. The spacious living area is unlike most condominiums or apartments. With near floor-to-ceiling glass surrounding two corners, the indoors and outdoors become one. Designer upgrades include exquisite hardwood floors, custom light fixtures, window treatments. The highlight is a sky view balcony that provides a seamless opportunity to take in the skyline. Enjoy cocktails or morning coffee as you overlook the city. Whether you use your kitchen primarily as a social space or as a traditional cooking venue, great beauty, refinement and technological efficiency are all built right in. This chefs kitchen offers the finest appliance suites, beginning with Bosch gas cooktops and ovens, Sub-Zero refrigerator, microwave ovens. The heart of your home is clad with beautiful natural grey polished quartzite countertops, stone backsplashes, signature white acrylic Studio Becker soft-close cabinets, and polished chrome Watermark fixtures. The master bedroom is perfectly appointed with hardwood floors, Hunter Douglas window treatments, a walk-in closet with organizers, and access to a second outdoor deck. Your master bath looks and feels like your own personal spa. Designed with natural stone tile and accented with Kohler fixtures, the master bath is a place to cleanse and refresh, invigorate and relax. Your master bath offers a separate tub and glass-enclosed shower and dual vanities. Enjoy world-class amenities in your high-rise home. An on-site fitness center with cooling terrace, 4,000 square foot roof terrace, doorman and concierge services, are among some of the many building amenities. If location really is everything, One Hawthorne has it all. Rising graciously above the vibrant and fashionable downtown San Francisco, One Hawthorne residents benefit from close proximity to fabulous shopping in Union Square, the finest dining, and attractions at The Metreon, and nightlife. The convenient downtown location connects you to major local and regional transportation assuring an easy commute to virtually anywhere in the Bay Area. Everything you want or need is just minutes away. This level of lifestyle underscores a fresh urban neighborhood attitude in which people work, study, play, shop, and eat close to home. This 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom condo at One Hawthorne is available unfurnished for $7,500 (12 month lease term) or furnished for $9,500 (3-12 month lease terms).  1,330 sq. ft. (per owner)  Poliform sofa, chairs, and bed in guest room DRE# 01369396 DRE# 01875716

head: Absolutely fabulous!  Luxurious living at a price that's just right!
post: The Place To Be! Escape to charming Novato with our quaint shops, expansive open space and key geographic locale - Matins northernmost city is the hub to hundreds of exciting activities. Create your own adventure while experiencing the beauty and excitement of Novato. Millworks in Novato has taken the green building mission to a whole new level. This new project is one of the highest Green Point Rated buildings in the area. Using new, progressive and sustainable techniques, Millworks is setting a new standard with previously unheard of features, such as a living roof, dedicated bike storage and passive solar heating techniques. That makes Millworks unsurpassed by any other development in the area. A Build it Green certified building that you will be proud to call home. City Features: -Peruse Old Towns shops and antiques -Hike forest trails and enjoy scenic vistas -Bicycle under historic oaks -Play a round of golf -Picnic in beautiful tree-lined parks -Observe birds and wildlife in preserves -Discover the natural beauty of state parks -Relax lakeside witha rod and reel -Explore historical museums and landmarks -Horseback ride through Indian country -Test your taste buds on world class wines -Choose from a variety of excellent restuarants Community Features: -Exercise and wellness room with state-of-the-art fitness facility (open 24hrs) -Social room with TVs & interactive activities (with Wi-Fi) -Quiet library -Outdoor playground (gated) -Rooftop garden featuring fountains (with seating and night lighting) -Whole Foods on site (delivers to our residents complimentary) -Underground parking (reserved spaces with individual bike hangers) -Controlled access (remote and key) -Recycling program -Concierge services -Smoke-free community -Walking distance to downtown restaurants and shops -Easy freeeway access -Sinaloa Middle School and San Marin High School -Close to transportation Home Features: -Tile flooring in entryway -Bosch washer and dryer in every home (stackable) -Air conditioning -Cat-5 wiring throughout home -Energy-saving dual glazed low-E vinyl/aluminum windows throughout -Wall and ceiling insulation meets or exceeds Title 24 energy code -Granite slab kitchen counters -Bosch stainless steel gas range with microwave/hood combo -Bosch ENERGY STAR dishwasher -Kholer faucets -Marble slab vanity counters -Dual flush toilets 1, 2, & 3 Bedrooms Available!! Our large 2BD2BTH is a ground-level home with two patio spaces, one off of living room, and the other located off of second bedroom. Quick street access is perfect for pet owners. In addition to the two bedrooms, there is a large 7 x 7.5ft. tech area in hall for home office/ study area (can also be used as a nursery). Huge passover kitchen bar area. Call us today to schedule an appointment for a tour! Walk-ins welcome!! Directions: From Highway 101 exit De Long Avenue and go west. Entrance is on your right. Millworks Novato 900 Reichert Avenue Novato, California 94945 (415) 335-7338 www.MillworksNovato.com

head: Showing! 6/15@ 1:00-1:30! 1900sGrandCraftsmans 3story home w/SF VIEWS!
post: Please email erirentals@gmail.com to express your interest. $4,500 per month, 5 bedrooms, 3 full baths, 1 half baths, 3,000 square feet First floor boast a charming formal dining room with wainscot walls, beam ceilings and original built-in china cabinet, most commonly used as the family room with access to the large and light filled eat-in kitchen with high counter tops custom built for the 6Ft. and over family that lived there. The first level also grants access to the basement/cellar through the kitchen. The grand staircase leads to the view filled formal living room with working fireplace, window seats, beam ceiling, original stain glass light fixtures, original oak hardwood floors and an off set office/den complete with patio that could also be used as a 5th bedroom complete with closet. The second floor also has 2 bedrooms and two baths, one of which is the master suite with private master bathroom and patio. The third level takes you to the tree top of this beautiful home. 2 bedrooms and one full bathroom. An enclosed sun porch makes for a quiet reading room or little get-a-way. Attic storage is ample and the crawl foot tub and slanted ceilings all add charm to this one of a kind. This is an older home, even though lots of work and effort has gone into preparing the home for its new residents, its not perfect, not all hardwood floors were refinished and placing rugs and runners is recommended. If you can see past the 39 steps from Alvarado Rd to access the house and if having a driveway and garage dont bother you, please feel free to come to an open house and get lost in this gorgeous home. The home sits on an over 9,000 sq. ft. lot and is surrounded by nature. A fenced garden and stoned paths lead you all the way around fruited trees, beautiful landscaping and of coarse outdoor living spaces to soak up the view and nature all around. The hike is worth it and the StairMaster is included with the rent. joke. ;) No pets or smoking No driveway or garage. The home is off Eucalyptus Path 39 steps down from Alvarado Rd. Thank you for your consideration, Sasha Bermudez DRE#1717359 ERI Property Management 2980 College Ave. Suite 5, Berkeley, CA 94705

head: Large Gorgeous Furnished Home, with Views- ReLISTO
post: The Home: This beautiful 5 bedroom, 4.5 bathroom single family home in the quiet neighborhood of Forest Hills has sweeping views of South San Francisco, Mt. Davidson, San Bruno Mountain and the Pacific Ocean. Nestled in the treelined street, this residence comes fully equipped with everything required to fully enjoy your stay in San Francisco. Rare to find amenities such as an outdoor hot tub, jacuzzi bath, formal dining room, and piano are just some of the great features. PHOTOS & click on Green Tabs: VIRTUAL TOUR: Main Level: The statley living room features a fireplace, television, built in speakers, WiFi, and baby grand piano. The formal dining room flows into the gourmet kitchen with updated gas appliances, kitchen island, two sinks, sub zero refrigerator and multiple appliances to create a wonderful meal. Enjoy your morning brew in the breakfast area adjacent to large window, fully appreciating the many sunny days granted to Forest Hill residents. Upstairs: The open, southern style staircase next to a multistory window, welcomes you to the Master Bedroom Suite. Featuring a king size bed, fireplace, walk in closet, and views of Southern San Francisco to start your day. The Master bath is adorned with tile, double vanity, jacuzzi tub and walk in shower. Lower Level: A game room, complete with pool table or ping pong table, balcony and its own bathroom are the perfect getaway from the day to day grind. Laundry, and garage parking are also on this level. Patio: The hot tub says it all. The patio is well protected by a wooden fence providing a restful backyard experience. If you feel like some gardening, there is an antique potting table at your disposal. Price includes all utilities, wifi, cable and alarm system. Price is based on a 3 month lease and may vary based on season and length of stay. KEY DETAILS - Family room can be converted to a 6th bedroom. We welcome Corporate Rentals also. head: Sunny Sustainable House w /River View
post: Sunny, single-family home with privacy - 2 bedroom, 1 full (amazing) bath, yard, large deck, and shared storage space in the basement with view of the Russian River to the south, an Osprey nest to the southwest and majestic redwood tree ring to the west on 1/4 acre. Great space for gardening! Warm enough for tomatoes and other nightshades and permaculture friendly. Private off-street parking and nearby nature trails that go on for miles. Green Design and Features: -2.4kW grid tied solar photovoltaic system -On-demand hot water -High efficiency EPA certified wood stove -No-VOC paint throughout entire house -Low-flow faucets and showerhead (they have great water pressure!) -Energy star refrigerator and dishwasher, gas stove and more.. What makes this a gem is the remodeled full bath: -Spectacular full bath with jacuzzi tub and shower -European glass shower doors -Natural tiles walls and floor and redwood ceiling and trim -Unique Vetrazzo (recycled glass) counter-tops -Skylight that looks on to redwood trees and the stars at night $1750/month plus security deposit, with lease, includes water and free electricity from the sun. Credit check and references. A well-behaved pet will be considered with a pet deposit. The property and house are non-smoking. no 420 growers. Available on July 1st. post: $5,740 per month, 3 bedrooms, 2 full baths, 0 half baths, 1,600 square feet ******************************************************************************************************** ***.....To see...Call Owner... Robert at 415 385 4114 ...Fast Showings...often possible. Please bring a tenant profile about yourself if possible and be ready to show excellent credit history and references.***SATURDAY 6/15/13...OPEN HOUSE...12 noon to 1pm ...1576 Fell St /call to confirm. ************************************************************************************************************* ***...A Special...Immaculately maintained 3 Bdrm / 2 Bath Designer Condo with a large well proportioned L shape living room/ dinning area...which is a Very Large space filled with Sunny South facing views. ***... Almost floor to ceiling dual pane energy saving & sound reducing windows... looking into the Golden Gate Panhandle Park with grass & big tree views...very comforting with a good connection to nature. A working fireplace is in this room. ***...This is a charming...very San Francisco bldg...built in 1986 with a with a steel box frame on the lower floor and an immaculate updated modern look ...but still a classic interior with abundant stylish detailing all recently remodeled in 2011 ... including crown moldings and quality finishes. ***...ONE PARKING SPACE: Comes with the condo at the stated rent. ***...SOUND REDUCTION: Each floor of this 3 unit Condo building has a concrete sub floor below its beautiful bamboo wood floor to reduce sound transfer between units. All windows are energy saving dual pane glass. ***...COLORS: Interior wall colors are mainly very soft yellow with lots of white wood and honey colored Bamboo Wood floors throughout. There are Art Deco wall sconces in all rooms plus track lighting in the living room and kitchen. There are some accent colors in various rooms. ***...BED & BATH: 2 large bdrms. with garden views plus 1 medium size, all with big closets & extra deep custom shelves from the Container Store that will make you never want to use ordinary closets. The master bdrm. has a bathroom inside. Each full bath has a marble floor, a frosted window & a quiet fan..along with elegant white Quartz Counters. These are 4 star hotel like bathrooms...fun to use. *** ...IN CONDO WASHER & DRYER: New high quality LG brand front loading full size... side by side units located in the hall bathroom. ***...COOKS SPACIOUS KITCHEN: The all new kitchen is a cooks delight ...a very open space featuring long White Quartz Counters, a White Italian Carrera Marble floor and many cabinets plus a large refrigerator, dishwasher,electric stove & a nice view to the park. The cook can feel connected to both any guests or to the outside park view and its abundant green plants. ***...21 BOTTLE WINE COOLER: With separate red & white wine temperature settings is built into the kitchen. ***...MULTI PURE WATER FILTERING SYSTEM: An under the sink higher quality filtering system to remove water impurities from San Franciscos already good quality water. Comes with a separate sink top cool water faucet. ***...This sophisticated Condo needs an exceptional tenant who is Fastidious with cleaning and has a low key lifestyle...This boutique condo requires a restrained life style with no loud partys.... ***...BIKE ROUTE: Across the street is The Major City EAST-WEST Bike Route that goes through Golden Gate Park and enables you to go East to Downtown SF or West through the full length of the park to the Pacific Ocean. Bike Parking is available. ***...LOCATION is MID CITY in NOPA...North of Panhandle Area...on Fell Street, one block east of Masonic directly across from the Panhandle Area of Golden Gate Park...almost directly in the center of San Francisco...3 plus miles to any city corner. Close by is Peets coffee, Whole Foods, Trader Joes, Luckys, the very useful JCC Gym & Social center on California x Masonic / Presidio...& Fillmore, Hayes Valley & Cole Valley shopping...the Hayes street bus goes directly down town/Union Square. ***...UTILITY FEE : A monthly Utility off set fee is required of $90. included in rent of $5,740. as we pay all Condo water, trash and sewer costs. ***...PARKING: One Garage space included in rent of $5,740. ***...SECURITY DEPOSIT: Is $7,500. All rents are required to be one check from a auto bill pay system due at the owners mail box on the first day of each month. ***...CREDIT STANDING: Excellent credit only & a history of a low key resident lifestyle...No smoking on premises, Including no Medical Marijuana what so ever even with a medical certificate as second hand smoke is a problem to others. ***...PET POLICY: Generally no pets considered...and no dogs please regardless of size.

head: Our Community is so nice Mother Nature moved in herself!
post: A few years back a family of Beavers built a dam on Alhambra Creek in downtown Martinez, and because the home of John Muir takes its legacy seriously, theyve been able to stay and thrive, delighting our human residents. Maybe they heard about the amazing deals at Muir Creek Apartments? Were already $100 a month less than our competition, and we pay your water, sewer & trash which saves you an additional $55 to $85 a month or more! Designed by an award-winning San Francisco architect, the spacious, light-filled units have carpet, mini-blinds, central heat/air, dishwasher, outside storage, plus built-in oven, range and microwave. Some even have washer and dryer hookups! The park-like grounds have tranquil canals, fountains, and bridges running throughout the complex, which you can enjoy from your balcony or patio. Recreational facilities include a sports court, pool, spa, clubhouse and well-equipped fitness center. Its no surprise the Beavers wanted to live here; Martinez is a wonderful community with that comforting small town feeling you crave. Were conveniently located across the street from the well-stocked Village Oaks shopping center, and BART access is practically on our front steps. The new Amtrak station will take you to Sacramento fast, but if you want to drive were not even a block away from Highway 4 and just minutes from the 680. To learn more about our Beaver friends, give us a call at 925-228-0760 and check us out at:

head: Its a beautiful day in the neighborhood
Homeless teen?  Opportunity knocks.
post: Are your parents drug addictions causing your family to be homeless? Tired of being their welfare check? Do you feel like you have no options? Were a couple in our fifties who live up in Shasta County. Ive seen far too many teens stuck in the same situation. They want to do good but there is bad all around them. If thats you, then nows your chance. We have a room available. Were not looking for monetary compensation but we do need someone to do housework. I cook, he does dishes, the rest is hit and miss. If you can take up the slack, go to school and get good grades, we will provide FREE room and board. The reason were not foster parents? I dont like jumping through all the hoops of foster care. Our house is a mess. We smoke and grow weed. (absolutely no other drugs, you be that way too, occasional alcohol). Im offering this because I like to help. I would love to give just one child (young adult) a chance to pull away from the crap life. Age is not a factor but you must be mature and self motivated. We have house rules but I dont want to parent you. We will keep this offer going throughout college, so long as youre a full time student with good grades. Send an e-mail with any questions.

head: lower flat of Victorian duplex in heart of Temescal
post: Im not a real estate agent or property manager. Im an individual homeowner. The beautiful little flat Im offering for rent is the lower half of my home -- a Victorian built in 1900 and fully renovated in 2000. Its right in the heart of Temescal -- on 46th Street, a half block west of Shattuck -- within walking distance of many wonderful restaurants, cafés, bakeries, shops, etc. -- most of them within a half mile radius. (If youre not familiar with this beautifully revitalized part of Oakland, you can check it out here: www.temescaldistrict.org), This is a completely independent unit - separate entry, full kitchen, full bath, etc. Its a very special place. The garden is particularly magical. I love renting to people who appreciate the beauty and uniqueness of this home as I do. Here are some of its ASSETS: * gas stove * washer/dryer (shared w/ landlord) * full bathroom (tiled floor) with tub and shower * large, beautifully landscaped garden adjacent to kitchen door * light & airy * high quality wood-like laminate flooring throughout (except for bathroom which has tile floors) * panel heaters in every room (except the bathroom) * freshly painted (will be the first week in July) * alarm system (tenant pays for monitoring service, if desired) * free highspeed internet connection * free Comcast cable television * easy street parking And the LOCATION is great: * quick, easy access to all freeways * great neighborhood & great neighbors * walking distance to BART (6 blocks) * walking distance to many wonderful restaurants, cafés, bakeries, specialty shops, etc. (youll find a listing of them here: www.temescaldistrict.org/business_directory) br> * 5 short blocks (0.3 mi.) from full-service post office & 24-hour Walgreens * 5 short blocks (0.3 mi.) from Temescal Produce Market (www.temescalproducemarket.com) * walking distance from site of Sunday Farmers Market * less than 1 mile from Piedmont Avenue shopping district * 1.2 miles from Rockridge Market Hall (www.rockridgemarkethall.com) * 10 minute drive to UC Berkeley * 10 minute drive to Downtown Berkeley * 10 minute drive to Downtown Oakland * very near Childrens Hospital, Sutter Hospital, Alta Bates and Kaiser. * very near College of Arts and Crafts The rental fee is $1890/month. The security deposit is $1890. All utilities except PG&E; are included. Lease term is one year. My current tenant is here through June 30th. Ill have the interior of the flat repainted during the first week in July. It will be available for move-in by Monday, July 8th (perhaps sooner, depending upon the extent of any repairs that may need to be made). I will be showing the flat on the afternoons of Saturday, June 15th and Sunday, June 16th, by appointment. Please contact me by phone or e-mail (reply to this message) to set an appointment to view the apartment. My phone number is (510) 547-6523. (I do not allow smoking in the flat or on the property. Small pets may be negotiable.) TO APPLY, all intended adult occupants please provide me with: current credit report employment verification (3 months pay stubs) completed application form (I have a preferred application form, and Id be happy to e-mail you a pdf upon request.)

head: Spacious & Sunny!giant attic bedrom open kitchen wonderful living room
post: Large spacious and sunny house for sublet the August with potentially flexible dates and extension into the fall. The place is fully furnished with ecclectic, artistic, clean furniture. I am looking preferably for a longer-term subletter for the months to come. I will consider both longer-term and shorter-term sublets. Heres the link to my Air B&B; site which has some pictures (more to come) and a short description of the place: House is located 2.5 blocks from MacArthur BART in Oakland, and is also near the C and F Trans-Bay AC transit lines, as well as numerous local bus lines (including the Emery-Go-Round that takes you right to Emeryville shopping). On-site laundry, off-street parking in the driveway. The house is on Lusk St. between 40th and 41st Streets. Very large, sunny, and open kitchen has all the usual features plus a dishwasher. The living room is large and open as well, with newly finished hardwood floors, loads of morning sunshine, and decorated with artsy (but clean!) furnishings (paintings on the walls by owner and friends). No television here! The bedroom is the uniquely built-out attic space which has a footprint bigger than 30 x 30! Large dormer window overlooks Oakland and Emeryville and beyond that theres a view from the bed of Mt. Tam and if you look in just the right direction you can see the Golden Gate too! This is a very open and somewhat eclectic space (rafters are bare, wood floors are unfinished) that has a lot of room for all sorts of activities ranging from reading, relaxing, yoga, dance, work, play, or wonderful deep sleeping! Note: stairs to the attic are steep and so arent appropriate for people who have issues with walking or balance. They are nothing outrageous and extremely manageable for most everyone with average abilities. The attic is uninsulated and therefore on the warmer side in the summer afternoons. Large windows let in wonderful afternoon sunshine and cross-breezes and I routinely open them in the morning and close them at night. Its also cooler in winter nights. Thats the trade-off. Full kitchen complete with modern toaster, electric kettle, full gas range and oven, etc. Full bath and shower, washer and drier on site, outside driveway parking for one or two cars may be arranged if requested (otherwise ample street parking always available). Piano for careful use (a mid-range Yamaha-- hammer-action digital Clavinova with volume control and full pedals). Access to a large backyard that is shared with the back-unit residents. Rent is pro-rated for your visit based on an $1800/month rate with utilities included (power, water, waste, and DSL). A security deposit will be required and returned after you leave and all is well ($1000). Email me if you are interested and LEAVE A PHONE NUMBER. I will return calls but NOT emails. Seriously. I want to be able to TALK to a person about this. As this is my home, it is crucial to me to find a person who is 100% trustworthy and whom I feel good about bringing into my home. The house is self-contained, but the shower is shared with a downstairs roommate-tenant in the evenings who otherwise doesnt use the house except for the occasional dinner meal cooking. She is a very sweet, interesting, and considerate lady, a full-time public school teacher with a masters in education. I will consider a very well-behaved dog to tag along with the rental. An additional deposit will be required.

head: Lovely, elegant condo in excellent location
post: Come home to a roomy 1 bedroom, 1 bath condominium! It is a front unit in a small building, so you have a view of lovely Victorians and trees. The neighbors are quiet & friendly. Relax in a spacious living area with floor to ceiling windows (almost an entire wall!) to let in the sun. This wall of widows includes a wide sliding glass door out to a balcony, for your own outdoor space, where you can dine, read, or just enjoy the view. Chill out in front of a fire in the working fireplace. Dine with friends in the adjacent dining area, which has space enough to comfortably fit a table and 6 chairs. Enjoy cooking in a roomy, elegant, well-appointed kitchen, which features granite counters, ample cabinet space & high quality appliances: electric stove, generous fridge, dishwasher & ample cabinet space. The bedroom is big enough to fit a king bed comfortably, with room left over, and has 1 large and 1 smaller closet. There is another large closet, fronted by mirrored doors, in hallway leading to the main living area. The bathroom is almost all white: White tiled shower over tub, white tile floor (with tiny diamonds of black), white sink with white marble vanity, and white w.c. -- just waiting for you to spice up with your own colored towels & accessories. There is a shower door, so you dont even need a shower curtain. The entire apartment, except the bathroom, is floored in light-colored hardwood. The lighting system is exceptional -- halogen lights on dimmer switches for warm, bright lighting that can be lowered to set a romantic mood. The building has an elevator for convenient move-in and out, as well as for daily use. There is a coin-operated laundry in the basement, shared by just 10 units, which is both convenient and safe. The neighborhood is quiet. Shopping and restaurants are steps away on Fillmore St. There is easy access to bus lines. No smokers. The condo is available July 1. head: Spacious 2BR Apartment near Shopping, Dining, & BART!

post: All you need to move in is your personal belonging. This beautiful home is fully furnished and even the kitchen is fully stocked with dishes and cookware, wine glasses, toaster... Perfect for relocating executives at only $200 per night. Upon entering the house, you will arrive in an inviting light filled living room with a fireplace. Large newly remodeled kitchen with granite counters, stainless steel sink and stove and double oven, and microwave and large refrigerator. Breakfast nook. Two additional light and bright bedrooms with nice size closets and views of the hills. One bathroom with double sinks and shower over tub. Laundry room with washer and dryer. Beautiful peaceful yard fully landscaped with grass and fountain, and different patios and sitting areas. The yard is completely private and is surrounded by peaceful hill and view of Mt. Diablo and plenty of wild life, birds.. visiting all day long. Serenity abounds. Central heating and cooling. Shutters on most windows. Cathedral ceilings. Two car garage. The house is fully furnished and towels and bedding are also provided for all rooms and bathrooms. Prefer a one year lease but will consider shorter term. No smoking and no pets. Good credit, verifiable income/employment is required. Security deposit is required. Tenant will pay all utilities. BART is a ten minutes ride. San Francisco (SF) is half hour on BART or with no traffic its approx. 40 minutes drive. Golf course is available down the street from the house, but its not a part of this community. Hiking, biking, all right outside of your door pretty much. Nearby areas are Moraga, Orinda, Walnut Creek, Pleasant Hill, Alamo. Danville and San Ramon are approx. 15-30 minutes, depending on the location. Weekly gardener services are included in the rent. post: This gorgeous two bedroom, two and a half bathroom condo is located in the heart of Nob Hill in a fabulous luxury building with twenty four hour doorman and amazing, direct bay views. The condo has been fully remodeled to reflect an ultra modern, high-end style with top of the line finishes. Every detail of the property has been carefully thought of and every luxurious amenity provided. There is a formal living room with exceptional bay views, gas fireplace and custom walnut and iron media component and shelving. The ceilings are beautiful with suspended glass bulb lighting and crown moldings, an art piece all in its own right. Flat screen TV and modern and comfortable furnishings provided. The dining room features a beautiful hand-crafted, slab walnut table and custom walnut and iron bar with northern views of the city. The kitchen is open to both the dining room and living room, perfect layout for entertaining. There is a large Cesar stone island with top of the line Swiss appliances. The master bedroom is light and airy with newly refinished hardwood floors, comfortable queen sized bed and an amazing walk in closet. The master bathroom is gorgeous with flooring, side walls, stand-alone shower and large tub made from slaps of Cararra marble accented with dark bronze fixtures. The second bedroom features a full sized bed as well as a twin bed and large desk with more great views of the bay. There is a second fully remodeled bathroom with large tile shower. One car parking included and laundry in the unit. This special condo is available now for those who expect luxury living in the heart of San Francisco.

head: Cottage in Kensington
post: This unique cottage is available for the first time in nine years. Built in the 1930s, it was the original house on the property, at the extreme back of the lot far from the street. The cottage is private and quiet, and surrounded by mature camellias, bougainvillea, fruit trees, etc. A brick patio separates the two buildings and leads into the basement area of our house, in which are a shared washer and dryer. Also included in the rent are PG&E;, water, and garbage. Although the bedroom is rather small, the kitchen is big and sunny, ceilings are high, and there is a large enclosed porch in front of the living room, providing extra space (161 sq. ft., unheated) and privacy. The bathroom has a stall shower (no tub). We have just renovated parts of the kitchen, preserving the pebble mosaics by the original owner. The neighborhood is wonderful--quiet, safe, convenient. We are one block away (via pedestrian path) from the Arlington Ave. shops, the #7 bus to Berkeley, and the express bus to San Francisco. Ten minutes drive to UC Berkeley or El Cerrito Plaza BART. Parking is adequate, on the street. No dogs. Please call Phil or Ann, (510) 527-4847.

head: Beautiful 1 Bedroom 1˝ Bath with Two Attached Garage Parking
post: Available around August 1, 2013. Enjoy this beautiful spacious 1 bedroom 1.5 bath townhome with 975 sq. ft. of living space at the San Jose City Lights Community. Characteristic of this unit is that it feels like living in your own little house. There is no one above you or below you. The front door opens on the ground floor to an entry foyer with a storage closet, laundry area with extra storage space, and direct access to an attached garage for two-car tandem parking. The second floor features the living room, dining area, kitchen, a half-bath for guests, and a spacious balcony. The master bedroom with full bath en suite is privately located on the third floor. There are also two separate sinks and a walk-in closet. Bedroom window opens to a beautiful tranquil view of Communications Hill. Whats more. . .. there is a gas fireplace and accent lighting in the living room. The kitchen is appointed with beautiful maple cabinetry and a breakfast bar. Unit is equipped with gas stove, refrigerator, dishwasher, garbage disposal, washer, dryer, central forced air heat and air conditioning. and custom shutters. This is truly a lovely home with many attentive details for comfortable living. Perfect for a single professional, executive, or a couple. Amenities in the condo community include a pool and spa. Property is located conveniently in South San Jose, with close access to major highways (US 87/85, 101), and proximity to shopping, parks, VTA, etc. Minimum one year lease. Security deposits is $1,900. Landlord pays HOA dues, which includes garbage. Tenant pays all other utilities (electricity, gas, water, phone, internet, TV, etc.). NO smoking, NO pets. Tenant must have good credit, and NO prior eviction and foreclosure history. A non-refundable $30.00 fee is required with each application to cover the cost of tenant screening. One application per adult tenant. If interested, please reply by email with name and contact info. Thanks, Owner/Property Management Condo Community: City Lights, San Jose 95136. keywords : communication 1BD 1bd 1BR 1br

head: Orinda house avail July 1 - walk to schools
post: Opportunity is knocking! This lovely house on a quiet street is coming available because the current tenants are buying a home. The owner has no plans to move into or sell this property, so it could be yours for a long time. Why is this house such a good deal, where tenants tend to stay for numerous years at a time? (the previous tenant lived there 10 years) (a) Its within walking distance of two excellent public schools, Del Rey Elementary, two blocks, and Miramonte High, 1.2 miles. (b) The rent is generally lower than for comparable houses because there is a second unit downstairs, with its own entrance. Its long-term resident is a quiet, retired grandmother whom you will like. She shares the provided laundry machines, and has a space in the two-car garage. There is plenty of parking. Three bedrooms (one quite large) and two baths, all on one level. Large living room with vaulted ceiling and fireplace, dining area, eat-in kitchen with updated appliances. Beautiful views and plenty of sunlight. Large front patio and back deck, usable back yard with lawn and space for a garden. There is an automatic watering system already in place. Lots of storage space. Unfurnished (tenants furniture appears in the photos). The weather tends to be cooler in the summer, warmer in the winter than in Lafayette, Moraga, Walnut Creek, Concord, Pleasant Hill, Alamo, Danville, etc. because of Orindas being first in line for moderating sea breezes. Available July 1. No dogs. Please call Phil at 510-527-4847.

head: Stunning 15th & Top Floor Corner with Views, Doorman, Utilities
post: Stunning 15th floor corner studio apartment with panoramic city views from Twin Peaks to the Transamerica Pyramid from five oversized windows. This gorgeous top floor apartment is located in the Hamilton Condominiums -- a landmark 1930s Art Deco building which was originally the Alexander Hamilton Hotel. If youre looking for exceptional city apartment living in an extremely well maintained historic San Francisco building with tons of character and great residents, this is the place! This elegant and immaculate apartment has been lovingly restored by the owner with attention to every detail. The apartment features a sleeping alcove, separate walk in closet area/extra room, open kitchen and full bath with tub and shower. The apartment has new professional paint and new quality carpet throughout. Rent includes all utilities - heat, water, electricity and garbage. Rent also includes a 24 hour security/doorperson and full gym access. A 12-month lease is required. No smoking, no drugs. Hamilton building amenities include: 24-hr security guard/doorperson Package receiving service Brand new fully-equipped 24 hour gym Completely restored lobby with marble fireplace, grand piano and free Wi-Fi Recently remodeled roof deck with panoramic views Courtyard with fountain Ballroom with 80 LCD TV and commercial kitchen State-of-the-art laundry room Community room Passenger and freight elevators Building hosted parties and events year round Onsite management Highly-professional maintenance staff Additional building info here: Conveniently located on the 38 and 27 bus lines and walking distance to MUNI/BART, Downtown, Union Square, Civic Center, restaurants, Symphony, Opera and various theaters. Apartment is available immediately.

head: Gorgeous 2Bed/2Bath Unit!!!
post: Its a buyers market, and my boss swore pigs would fly before he lowered the rents on his prize apartment community even though we had vacancies up the gazoo just a couple months ago. I cut those rents till we had a queue of drooling prospects hanging out of our door waving checks.  Weve got just a few of those giveaway-priced, stunning apartment homes left.  You can save hundreds (yes, thats plural) of dollars a month over other comparable apartment communities in our area.  That could be an extra car payment, or a family vacation!  We offer the ultimate in comfort and elegance, well-appointed with wood-burning fireplaces and spacious floorplans.  Stunning landscaping includes fountains, bridges, & lakes, and beautiful Laurel Creek Park is across the street.  The manicured common areas have a sparkling pool, heated spa, and clubhouse. Theres an on-site laundry facility. Conveniently close to the I-80 freeway, good neighbors, attentive management, and a great location in a primarily single family residential area near schools and shopping.  Look at the pictures on their website and youll see what an incredible deal youre getting!  And when you visit us, pay no attention to the overhead swarm of flying pigs.  Theyre perfectly harmless.  Call 707-428-3465 to schedule a tour. Bring your umbrella and your skillet (for the flying bacon). Please mention Ad Code MV34 and check out: *No Section 8*

head: OPEN HOUSE Wed June 12 6-6:30pm  (oakland/berkeley border)
post: Adeline Courtyard Apartments is a 14 unit complex at the intersection of MLK, Adeline Street and Stanford Avenue . The shared courtyard features benches and lovely hanging plants, the perfect place to get some fresh air and enjoy a good book. The on-site laundry facility ensures you dont spend nights at a laundry mat, and off street parking means youll never have to circle the block hoping for a spot. The property has great on-site resident managers who strive to build community and create beautiful spaces. Located just 3 Blocks from Ashby BART and biking distance from UC Berkeley, it is also just four doors down from a local favorite, The Sweet Adeline Bakeshop, where you can go each morning to get a hot cup of coffee and fresh baked pastries. The South Berkeley Farmers Market is held right outside our gate every Tuesday, rain or shine. head: Magnificent Furnished Executive Estate
post: This stunning classic gated estate of distinctive architectural style balances elegance and high style with flexible functionality. Luxurious amenities and finest materials define this spacious five-bedroom four full-baths two half-bath spectacular estate property perfectly situated on 1.25 acre lot. Located within minutes to downtown Saratoga and Los Gatos, this beautiful home feels completely secluded yet is close to all the best that Silicon Valley and the Bay Area have to offer. Two dramatic private entry gates open to a long lane of interlocking pavers bordered by carpet roses and lawn; the circular driveway continues to the broad steps of a stone stairway leading to the grand custom mahogany door. The foyer is floored with marble and lit with a brilliant crystal chandelier. This dramatic reception serves as a prelude to the grandeur of the formal living room and dining room. This luxury executive estate presents California comfort and elegant ambiance with lavish finishes throughout - elaborate millwork, moldings, columns, marble, mosaic tiles and Brazilian cherry hardwood floors, French doors which fill the home with light and views of the very private picturesque grounds, regal marble flooring, rich cherry cabinetry, and fine drapery. 5 spacious bedrooms including grand master suite, executive library, 4 full baths and 2 half baths, extravagant living room, 4 fireplaces, separate formal dining room, state of the art custom gourmet kitchen with Wolf 48 Pro Gas Range, Subzero 48 Pro refrigerator and other top of the line stainless steel appliances, breakfast nook, spacious family room, laundry room, integrated security camera system, central audio/communication system, central air/heating system and central vacuum system define the grandeur of this unique home. The professionally landscaped resort like grounds, large sparkling pool, three car garage with ample outdoor parking represents the finest in Californias fabled indoor/outdoor living and is an entertainers delight in Saratogas exclusive neighborhood. An exceptional rare masterpiece. Award Winning Saratoga Schools. Rent: $25,000 per month Application Fee: $35 per adult Security Deposit: $50,000 and last month rent $25,000 Lease Term: 1 year lease No pets No smoking Rental insurance required Monthly house cleaning service, weekly pool service and weekly gardening service included in rent Call 650.320.8500 for details. Proof of income required to view home. Photo id required to view home.

head: Americas Cup Corner View Condo! 1 car pkg! Furnished! Short Term Ok!!
post: (415) 447-2055 Furnished Short Term Corner View Condo! Located within a few minutes to the Marina and Financial District of San Francisco, A beautifu large urban condo with two Bedroom/Bathroom suites separated by a central great room overlooks parts of the Americas Cup boat courses and is available to rent per week or month during the Americas Cup trials and finals. The large living complex holds a raised dining area with views, a TV lounge, an office, and an open-plan kitchen, and entry hallway. The condo is situated at the end of a quiet street at the foot of the Cliff of Telegraph Hill. Silence and views prevail. This fifth floor condo is 100 feet away from the Americas Cup Pavilion Park with a squeaky new Pier 27, one of two official start lines, and a renovated Pier 29. The two main sites for visitors will be Americas Cup Park and Pavilion, located along The Embarcadero at Piers 27-29 three minutes walk away, and the Americas Cup Village at Marina Green, a 20 minute walk or 7 minute bike ride away. Race headquarters and interactive exhibits are located feet away at Piers 23-27, as well as the Americas Cup Pavilion, a 9,000-seat temporary concert venue now hosting Sting and other outdoor concerts and AC event ceremonies. The great room is spacious with AC dining views and contemporary art work. The master bedroom features wooden antique Korean screens accenting the flowering cliff outside, European contemporary artwork, and a large Cal king bed. The office bedroom houses custom-designed maple and zebra wood cabinets and a sleigh bed, ideal for two children, or a couple. A secured indoor parking space is available. Many leading local sites are accessible by foot, by classic street cars with exclusive, dedicated tracks down the Embarcadero, and by 3 cable car lines traversing San Franciscos hills. Fishermans Wharf is also just a few minutes away, as well as some of San Franciscos favorite restaurants. Five parks with waterfalls, streams and fountains are also outside the door. For exercise, one can immediately climb three different staircases to Coit Tower at the top of Telegraph Hill, perhaps catching a favorable view of the races. There are beds for four (one Calif. King-size; two singles). Furnished with full kitchen facilities and washer-dryer room. Linens provided. Gymnasium overlooks enclosed garden. Sauna and jacuzzi. 24-hour reception and security. The residence has a reflection pool and a water fountain, gym, sauna, jacuzzi, conference space, an extra room to rent, ample terraces, and is nestled between two of the three staircases for ambling up Telegraph Hill, where the famous flocks of Green Parrots are spotted from time to time. Access can be available to the best sports club in San Francisco, only a short stroll away, with full amenities including squash, tennis, yoga suite, Olympic pool, full gymnastic equipment and top expert classes, spa and massages, cafe, excellent changing rooms with steam baths, saunas, and jacuzzis. It is an easy walk to downtown locations such as the financial district, the new Ferry Building complex and Farmers Market, many Museums including the brand new Exploratorium a few piers away, Union Square, the Civic Center (2nd largest aggregation of Art Deco Buildings in the US, many built at the turn of the century after the Gold Rush), and transportation outside the door constitutes the worlds largest classic tram and cable car railway system, plus ferries, bikes and boats for hire. Stroll to Pier 39 to the Eagle Cafe or Fog Harbor Inn for the views of both the Golden Gate and the Bay Bridge, to Pier 31 for wholesale fish and seafood, the boats to Alcatraz, or a Hornblower ferry boat dinner excursion, Pier 23 for beers and food on the water, or to Levi Strauss Plaza for coffee or dinner overlooking waterfalls and a myriad of flowers. CALL TODAY! DAWN CUSULOS 415-678-8854 DRE#01142235 07/01/2013 Created on 2013-06-14 15:57 PDT

head: Brand New B3 Lofts - Open Houses Start Tomorrow!
post: Every Saturday & Sunday from 12pm -- 4pm 5200 Adeline Street, between 46th and 53rd Warning: this is still an active construction site. Wear appropriate footwear. Located on the border between Oakland and Emeryville, the B3 Lofts is the newly built third and final phase of Madison Parks Bakery Lofts community. B3 Lofts will add an additional 79 apartments, lofts, commercial space and a café to the Bakery Lofts community, bringing the total amount of residential units to 172. Starting in August, 18 of the 79 units will be ready to rent! These will include 1 bedroom, 2 bedroom/2bath, 2 bedroom + loft/2bath, and 3 bedroom/2bath units. They will feature stainless steal appliances, granite counter tops, stained concrete floors, and plenty of closet space. Off-street parking in a gated lot is included (one spot). Prices range from $1,750 to $2,850 depending on bedroom type and square footage. Close to numerous nearby shopping areas, neighborhoods, groceries, entertainment, freeways and to public transportation. MacArthur Bart is a 5 min drive away. The 18 units opening in August will be pet-friendly, but we reserve the right to pre-screen pets and accept only indoor cats and fixed dogs and cats. 2 pet maximum. Pet deposit required-- $500 per dog/$250 per cat. One year leases, security deposits are equal to one months rent plus additional for pets, gate openers, and other circumstances. Because of the high volume of calls received, email is the best way to contact us. head: Golfers, we're close to the course & have room to stow your clubs!
post: Designed by an award-winning San Francisco architect, the spacious, light-filled Muir Creek Apartments are less than 3 miles from 3 nice golf courses, and each unit has an outdoor storage area, perfect for all your gear! They also have carpet, mini-blinds, central heat/air, dishwasher, plus built-in oven, range and microwave. Some even have washer and dryer hookups! The park-like grounds have tranquil canals, fountains, and bridges running throughout the complex, which you can enjoy from your balcony or patio. Recreational facilities include a sports court, pool, spa, clubhouse and well-equipped fitness center. Were already $100 a month less than our competition, and we pay your water, sewer & trash which saves you an additional $55 to $85 a month or more! That should cover your greens fees for the month! Martinez is a delightful community with that comforting small town feeling you crave. The Martinez Marina is your gateway to the Delta and outdoor fun, as are the numerous marshes and walking trails. We have a first class community theater, and theres a winery just a half mile from our door! Conveniently located across the street from the well-stocked Village Oaks shopping center, and BART access is practically on our front steps. The new Amtrak station will take you to Sacramento fast, but if you want to drive were not even a block away from Highway 4 and just minutes from the 680. Give us a call at 925-228-0760

head: Harmony with Nature & Your Neighbors! Fountains, Canals, Bridges!
post: Designed by an award-winning San Francisco architect, the spacious, light-filled Muir Creek Apartments are in town, but have park-like grounds with tranquil canals, fountains, and bridges that give off a Zen-like, almost Feng-shui sense of harmony and happiness. All our units have carpet, mini-blinds, central heat/air, dishwasher, outside storage, plus built-in oven, range and microwave. Some even have washer and dryer hookups! Recreational facilities include a sports court, pool, spa, clubhouse and well-equipped fitness center. Best of all, you get all this gorgeousness for about $100 a month less than apartment communities that arent half as nice! And we pay your water, sewer & trash which saves you an additional $55 to $85 a month or more! Martinez is a delightful community with that comforting small town feeling you crave. The Marina is your gateway to the Delta and outdoor fun, as are the numerous marshes and walking trails. We have a first class community theater, and theres a winery just a half mile from our door! Conveniently located across the street from the well-stocked Village Oaks shopping center, and BART access is practically on our front steps. The new Amtrak station will take you to Sacramento fast, but if you want to drive were not even a block away from Highway 4 and just minutes from the 680. Give us a call at 925-228-0760

head: Modern Living Still Has its Charm in this 1BR/1BA Apartment!
1 Bedroom- Awesome Location for a Commuter
Gorgeous 2Bed/2Bath Unit Downstairs!!!
post: Its a buyers market, and my boss swore pigs would fly before he lowered the rents on his prize apartment community even though we had vacancies up the gazoo just a couple months ago. I cut those rents till we had a queue of drooling prospects hanging out of our door waving checks.  Weve got just a few of those giveaway-priced, stunning apartment homes left.  You can save hundreds (yes, thats plural) of dollars a month over other comparable apartment communities in our area.  That could be an extra car payment, or a family vacation!  We offer the ultimate in comfort and elegance, well-appointed with wood-burning fireplaces and spacious floorplans.  Stunning landscaping includes fountains, bridges, & lakes, and beautiful Laurel Creek Park is across the street.  The manicured common areas have a sparkling pool, heated spa, and clubhouse. Theres an on-site laundry facility. Conveniently close to the I-80 freeway, good neighbors, attentive management, and a great location in a primarily single family residential area near schools and shopping.  Look at the pictures on their website and youll see what an incredible deal youre getting!  And when you visit us, pay no attention to the overhead swarm of flying pigs.  Theyre perfectly harmless.  Call 707-428-3465 to schedule a tour. Bring your umbrella and your skillet (for the flying bacon). Please mention Ad Code MV34 and check out: *NO SECTION 8*

head: This apartment will leave you breathless
post: This exquisite apartment is available and a must see. This stunning 4plex is on a quiet, tree lined street. It must be seen, as other apartments in the area do not compare either in size or beauty, despite what you read in ads. Nothing like it on the market. You will fall in love. These sunny, spacious apartments were built with loving attention to detail. The living room is double the size of ordinary ones. The full formal dining room is large and can serve as a home office. Handsome tongue and groove pegged hardwood floors, deco niches and small built in bookcases, sun drenched rooms. Dramatic vintage bathroom with seperate tub and shower. All the fixtures and tile original. Solid 1930s stucco exterior to keep you cool in the summer and warm in the winter. Floor to ceiling cabinets in the kitchen. Two walk in closets plus storage in the basement locker make way for keeping your sunny apartment uncluttered. Each apartment has an individual thermostat with vents in each room. Front and back entrances to each apartment for ultimate privacy. Unique California garden. This apartment is larger than most 2 bedrooms The magnificent living room and full dining room with large, dramatic windows and deco arches and details are bathed in sunlight. The separate garage uses an automatic opener for ease and convenience. Laundry on the premises. Walk to main S.F. bus line and access by bus to BART. Water and garbage pickup paid. Great for quiet professionals with good credit and references. NONSMOKERS. Cats negotiable. 2527 8th Avenue, Apt. 1, Oakland CA Open Sunday, June 16, 12-1 PM. Monthly rent $1525

head: Perfect Location btwn Japantown and Coleman Shopping
post: A quiet refuge in a busy city. This 2 bedroom / 2 bathroom condo is available starting on July 15th. There is an attached garage that leads directly into your kitchen. The unit comes with a secure one car garage and a parking pass for a second vehicle. The unit has ample light in all living areas, a gas stove and a very large deck. The oversized master bedroom, second bedroom and deck look out onto the common green space. The master bathroom has a very long counter and two sinks in addition to a very large tub. The unit is located directly between the Coleman shopping center (Trader Joes, Panera, Target and a new BJs Brew Pub coming this fall) and Japantown, with a very short walk to downtown. If you take lightrail to work, the unit is located just one block from the Japantown/Ayer stop. For your inner chef, the kitchen has a gas stove and a new microwave oven as well as full sized refrigerator. To complete the package there is a utility room with full sized washer and dryer units for your convenience. Finally, there is a great walking/bike trail (Guadulupe Trail) and a delightful pool for your use at the complex as well as close access to the Ryland park and pool. One year lease. *Gas Fireplace *Dishwasher *Full Size Washer *Full Size Dryer *Microwave *Attached Garage w. Nice neighbors.  Easy access to San Thomas Expressway, 280, 880, and 17 freeways. But absolutely no traffic noise at all. It is also minutes away from the Valley Fair mall, Santana Row, fine dining, schools, hospitals, and entertainment. Please email us if you are interested to apply. Once we receive your email, we will reach out to you for additional information and/or to schedule an appointment to view the apartment. We want this to be a lovely and enjoyable living space for you and your loved ones. Let us work together to achieve this goal. head: 2 bedroom 1 bath in a beautiful apartment in Walnut Creek $1735
post: We are currently looking for anyone interested in taking over our lease on July 16th or anytime sooner if needed and lease ends on September 21st with possibility to renew after that at a really good rate. We are currently paying $1735 at our apartment for a 2 bedroom 1 bath apartment. When you renew its an increase of 2-5% increase which is really good for this spot, this apartment complex and any apartment for that matter on this street. They are currently asking $2213 for our 936 sq ft apartment. Everything in this apartment is up to date and very modern. It has laminate wood floors throughout other than the two bedrooms than has a light beige carpet. Plentiful storage in both bedroom and hallways. I cannot express how impressed I was with the storage in this apartment. Stainless steel appliances and granite in kitchen and bathroom vanity area. Generous patio area facing the creek and this apartment is on the first floor. Elevators in each building and laundry room on the third floor. Pets are also allowed with the traditional additional deposit and pet rent I believe. We have one parking spot with our place in the garage, not everyone gets that. There is a gate you would have to go through this complex during after office hours. Every building and amenety require a key to get it which I like and cameras in most of the common area. The gym is brand spanking new, common lobby area is great for studying and just hanging out, plenty of bbq spots and pool area is very nice as well. Unlike most apartment you only have 1 or 2 office staff and 1 maintanence person that wouldnt get to you until about a week later. Theres nightly patrol and security so your cars are safe just make sure you have your parking pass out. Theres so much office staff here and until late hours and the plenty of maintenance too and they fix everything quick. We would love to stay here but we have another baby on the way and it wouldnt be enough space for us four. We already notified the office of our early lease termination but thought wed help out and try to get it rented sooner than later. Plus was hoping anyone looking to rent a place here could get in cheap. Like I mentioned earlier this place is currently renting for $2213 and we are only paying $1735 and if you want to extend you still only pay anything close to the asking price now. Feel free to Email me at the link provided above or call/text 707-696-5694 with any additonal questions or for viewing. Heres a link to The Retreat apartment complex

There are 2 generous sized carpeted bedrooms on the upper level with high ceilings, ample closet space, and double pane windows. Large full bath with double sinks and separate ˝ bath for guests and convenience. Other amenities include a secured parking space with access to the home and private secured patio thats excellent for BBQs and urban gardening. Pets are welcome as long as they are permitted by the HOA. Available after June 10th. (While pictures show the unit as it was recently staged, the unit is unfurnished.)

post: The Home: This beautiful 5 bedroom, 4.5 bathroom single family home in the quiet neighborhood of Forest Hills has sweeping views of South San Francisco, Mt. Davidson, San Bruno Mountain and the Pacific Ocean. Nestled in the treelined street, this residence comes fully equipped with everything required to fully enjoy your stay in San Francisco. Rare to find amenities such as an outdoor hot tub, jacuzzi bath, formal dining room, and piano are just some of the great features. PHOTOS & click on Green Tabs: VIRTUAL TOUR: Main Level: The statley living room features a fireplace, television, built in speakers, WiFi, and baby grand piano. The formal dining room flows into the gourmet kitchen with updated gas appliances, kitchen island, two sinks, sub zero refrigerator and multiple appliances to create a wonderful meal. Enjoy your morning brew in the breakfast area adjacent to large window, fully appreciating the many sunny days granted to Forest Hill residents. Upstairs: The open, southern style staircase next to a multistory window, welcomes you to the Master Bedroom Suite. Featuring a king size bed, fireplace, walk in closet, and views of Southern San Francisco to start your day. The Master bath is adorned with tile, double vanity, jacuzzi tub and walk in shower. Lower Level: A game room, complete with pool table or ping pong table, balcony and its own bathroom are the perfect getaway from the day to day grind. Laundry, and garage parking are also on this level. Patio: The hot tub says it all. The patio is well protected by a wooden fence providing a restful backyard experience. If you feel like some gardening, there is an antique potting table at your disposal. Price includes all utilities, wifi, cable and alarm system. Price is based on a 3 month lease and may vary based on season and length of stay. KEY DETAILS - Family room can be converted to a 6th bedroom. We welcome Corporate Rentals also. Price based on season and length of term (and sometimes depending on furnished or unfurnished home). head: Beautiful 2800 sq ft Luxurious Condo with Striking Views of Downtown
post: Enjoy striking views from the Downtown SF Skyline to the San Francisco Bay from this luxurious condominium, constructed only 19 years ago, and largely remodeled in 2009 and 2010. Built on a grand scale and designed on two levels, this elegant house-like residence is perched high above vibrant Castro Street, overlooking both Noe and Eureka Valleys. The open, flowing floor plan is ideal for entertaining or simply retreating to the family room to enjoy the sweet garden outlook. Some of the many specialized features of this home include a gourment kitchen, nine and a half foot ceilings, custom bookshelves, and both gas and wood-burning fireplaces. The Master Bedroom has sweeping views, as well as a generous double closet and Master Bath. The striking hallway with illuminated, built-in glass shelves leads to the two large rear bedrooms, each of them stepping out to a charming rear patio. The property is semi-detached offering abundant natural light throughout, especially in the living room with its new gas fireplace. The front of the living room extends out far beyond neighboring homes, allowing panoramic views from both the front and sides of the living room that take in downtown SF and Eureka Valley on the left, Liberty Hill and beautiful Victorians across the street, and Noe Valley and the Bay to the right. The formal dining room and living room are grand in scale and design and connect seamlessly, making this home perfect for entertaining. Gorgeous deep brown walnut hardwood floors were recently installed in the living room, dining room, family room, master bedroom, and hallway, instilling a sense of grandeur and elegance throughout. The gourmet kitchen was remodeled in 2009 and features gorgeous granite countertops, maple cabinets, hi-end Thermador refrigerator and appliances, and an attractive new tiled floor, and opens to the rear family room. The family room, with a 60-inch Pioneer big screen TV and balcony, overlooks a serene flowering garden and is ideal for contemporary urban living. An attractive wine bar was added in 2010. The master bedroom has sweeping views of Downtown, Eureka Valley, and the neighboring Victorian Ladies. There is also generous closet space and a tiled master bath with separate tub and stall shower. The two rear bedrooms are nicely separated from the Master by a long, elegant hallway, with built-in illuminated glass shelves. All three bedrooms are very large -- each about 50% larger than normal comparable bedrooms. Both rear bedrooms have large closets and walkout access to the rear patio. This house-like residence is perched high above the flat block of vibrant Castro Street and comes largely furnished. Enjoy the convenient access of Muni (bus stop on end of same block) and also an elevator that brings you from street level to near the front door, so you can enjoy those amazing views without having to walk up numerous flights of stairs. Available now. Call 650-968-2647 for further information.

head: Take over lease for beautiful loft-style apartment home!
post: I have a one year lease at Durant Lofts in Oakland/San Leandro border. Looking for someone who is interested in taking over lease. Due to some unfortunate circumstances we have to cut our lease short. You will keep the current rental rate of $1575 until the lease expires in April 2014. Its a beautiful spacious loft thats minutes to BART and freeways, polished concrete floors, oversize dressing room/walk-in closet, FoodMaxx grocery store on 1st flr, gourmet kitchen w/ open design, giant bathroom w/ counterspace, large ceiling high windows(a lot of natural light), coin laundry located right outside front door! The loft is 1375 sq. ft. On the 2nd flr and is turn-key, clean and ready for the next tenant! If youre interested, you will be screened by management prior to being allowed to occupy home. For loft pictures check out the website: Contact Katie @ 925-548-3683 or reply to email
