head: Near Oliver Road in Fairfield
post: Very nice spacious 4 bedroom Ranch-style home with 2.5 bathrooms in a lovely, quiet neighborhood in West Fairfield. Patio deck, fenced backyard with a lawn in the back. Front and back yards are very easy to maintain. The entire home is very well maintained by someone who really cares about this property and quickly addresses any concerns, regardless how small. Of course, it includes a washer and dryer in a separate laundry room. Also, updated appliances: electric stove, oven, microwave and dishwasher. Two car garage with an automatic garage door opener. Sunny eat-in kitchen nook adjoins a bright kitchen with large windows looking out to the backyard. Lovely plants: hydrangeas and an orange tree to name a few. Large family room with a fireplace, too. Master bedroom with large mirrored closets that are as spacious as the room. The other three bedrooms are ample-spaced, too. Lush, quality carpet throughout. Contact me if you would like to see this remarkable house. Pet deposit(s) required.

head: Near Oliver Road in Fairfield
post: Very nice spacious 4 bedroom Ranch-style home with 2.5 bathrooms in a lovely, quiet neighborhood in West Fairfield. Patio deck, fenced backyard with a lawn in the back. Front and back yards are very easy to maintain. The entire home is very well maintained by someone who really cares about this property and quickly addresses any concerns, regardless how small. Of course, it includes a washer and dryer in a separate laundry room. Also, updated appliances: electric stove, oven, microwave and dishwasher. Two car garage with an automatic garage door opener. Sunny eat-in kitchen nook adjoins a bright kitchen with large windows looking out to the backyard. Lovely plants: hydrangeas and an orange tree to name a few. Large family room with a fireplace, too. Master bedroom with large mirrored closets that are as spacious as the room. The other three bedrooms are ample-spaced, too. Lush, quality carpet throughout. Contact me if you would like to see this remarkable house. Pet deposit(s) required.

head: Beautiful modern 2 BR/1 BA with Bay views, parking, storage
post: We are looking for a quiet, professional individual or couple to rent out the upper unit of a 2-unit duplex.  Updated just a few years ago with new paint and new windows, this home has expansive views of the Bay.  Enjoy your meals in the dining room, overlooking the Bay, and nestled into Oak trees.  French doors open onto a deck.  The kitchen has an open air plan and flows nicely into the living room.  Hardwood floors are a sophisticated espresso stain, and all blinds are custom-made of white wood.  Our duplex is located in a quiet cul-de-sac at the top of a private driveway.  We designed the space to have a clean, modern feel.This is a perfect home for someone who wants to enjoy all the charms of Sausalito and have a quiet place to retreat to.  Garage for 1 car, an additional car fits in the driveway.  Ample storage room with locked door in the garage.  Shared laundry room with the other unit.  Walk to public transportation for SF commute. Open House Saturday, June 15th 10am - 1pm.

head: Beautiful Hillside Home Available August 1st

head: Beautiful Spanish Home with Loads of Charm!!
post: Available June 1st!!!! This Gorgeous 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath House was built circa 1937 and truly reflects the Spanish Mediterranean Style Architecture of the Period with high ceilings and lots of windows. Its located in the desirable Lower Vista / St. Basils Neighborhood. Youll feel welcomed to walk through the intimate brick paved courtyard with a Tiled Lion-head wall fountain surrounded by mature Palm Trees, Flowering Vines, and Bird of Paradise before reaching the arched front door. As you enter this Beautiful home, youre greeted by an inviting entryway into the living room with 3 large arched bay windows overlooking the Spanish courtyard. There is hardwood floors, handmade wrought iron light fixtures, and a cozy fireplace. There is another arched entryway into the large formal dining room with views of the courtyard. The kitchen and the breakfast nook are all original, except for the track lighting and the Frigidaire Gallery series stainless steel appliances. The Bedrooms are spacious with mini walk-in closets and views of the large brick paved Backyard. Throughout the seasons, you can entertain / relax in the front or the backyard listening to the water fountain or sipping fresh lemonade from the prolific Lemon tree as you watch the palm trees dance in the wind. This is your opportunity to enjoy a Beautiful Home that was truly designed for Fine Living inside our out. Willing to consider a reduced deposit with excellent credit & references.

Its 1380 sq ft and, besides the large main room in the shot, has a bath, kitchen and 200 sq ft office on the ground floor and a bedroom, office [or 2nd bedroom] and open loft [170 sq ft] on the second floor. A comfortable space for two tenants. Adjacent spaces in the same building include a recording studio, music lesson studio and floral designer space -- all occupied by very friendly and artistic tenants. The available space also includes a separate 325 sq woodworking shop. Other features: Off the Powell St exit in Emeryville. Excellent central location to Bay Area on gated lot, off the street, in secure hood, with free Eville shuttle bus to BART, one block from Amtrak. Good heat, 18 ceilings, concrete floors, lots of storage, and artistic environment. WIFI, Comcast & Direct TV available, if desired. Fully furnished and equipped: - Danish wood-burning stove - Full kitchen: stove-oven, fridge, dishwasher, stacked washer-dryer, microwave, toaster oven, coffee maker, espresso maker & milk steamer, toaster, popcorn maker, pannini press, food processor, garbage disposal. Office equipment use: two PCs, copier, printer, fax. Charmglow gas BBQ grille. Walking distance to Trader Joes, Bay Street, restaurants & shops. Loads of natural light. Offstreet parking and basketball court. Rent: $2,500/mo, PG&E; & garbage not included.

head: UTILITIES INCLUDED! LARGE GARDEN APT w/ BALCONY - LOS ALTOS BORDER!
$3600 / 5br - 3300ft˛ - Beautiful 5Br. 4.5Ba Home in Gated Community
post: A rare opportunity to live in a 5 bedroom 4.5 bath home within the gated Montecito community in Concord. A fountain courtyard invites you into the home. Separate living and dining rooms each have views of the valley. The kitchen is the focal point of the home, attached to a large nook. A huge granite top island opens up into the family room. Stainless steel dual ovens, dishwasher, microwave and refrigerator compliment this impressive kitchen space. From the nook and kitchen, dual French doors swing wide into the porch and custom landscaped backyard. The family room, the largest room in the house, has a custom built-in entertainment center with surround sound. A bedroom is on the first floor, with its own full bath and walk in closet, an ideal location for guests. The second story has three regular sized bedrooms, which share two full baths. A quiet bedroom with great lighting and five windows, is ideal for an office. Gorgeous views of the valley are seen from another bedroom with a full bath. All rooms feature plenty of closet space. Plantation shutters frame the huge master bedroom, and can be kept open with privacy afforded by this homes location at the crest of the neighborhood. The master bath features dual vanities split by a large soaking tub. An expansive walk-in closet features full length mirrors. A quiet, secluded entry courtyard connects with a large lawn and patio in the backyard. A tandem garage can hold 3 cars. Features a full monitored alarm system and wired internet. The Montecito gated development has a swimming pool with spa for residents, private community path and jogging trail, and a play structure. There is easy access to the Lime Ridge Open Space trails and hiking to Mt. Diablo State Park. Nearby supermarkets, parks, and schools. Close to highways 24 & 680 and Walnut Creek, Pleasant Hill, and Concord BART stations. Available End of July to August 1st.

head: Beautiful 2-bedroom apartment with Den in your own private oasis.
post: This home is awesome! Our G floor plan is the largest apartment we offer and it features extra large closets, a walk-in pantry, private balcony, updated appliances, and brand new cabinetry! It also has a library space that makes a wonderful guest bedroom or office.Northpark, an Equity Residential community, has so many things to offer from the convenience of your home. Our resident portal is set up to help you not only do normal daily tasks from the comfort of your home but also reduce the carbon footprint of day to day life. You do not have to drive to the Leasing Office to drop off your rent check....you dont even have to write a check! Simply go online to our resident portal and pay directly online. You can save time by submitting work orders on the resident portal, check your resident statement, you can meet your neighbors, sell items that you no longer need to your neighbors or purchase things from them. We also have electronic applications and leases, reducing paper usage. In addition to upgrading our apartments, one of the investments weve made to make the whole property more environmentally responsible is the installation of new solar electric panels. These solar panels not only power the shared space at the property but even provide renewable energy to the grid when the sun is shining brightest. They also reduce the propertys carbon footprint by the equivalent of taking every car at the property off of the road. We like to play our part when it comes to helping our residents live a more environmentally friendly lifestyle.

head: Fantastic Pac Heights Home, Spacious and Bright-FOUNDATION
Avail 7/14 Kensington Furnished 3 Bed Spainsh View
post: Traditional Mediterranean 3 bed 1.5 baths tastefully updated and completely remodeled with original red-oak hardwood and period hardware. This unique Arlington Ave. property offers hospitality with beauty, charm and comfort. The house is furnished. There are 3 ample bedrooms, a living room with fireplace and a formal dining room. The sunny spacious sunny remodeled kitchen has stainless steel counters, recessed lighting and new appliances along with a dishwasher and garbage disposal. The large bright eat-in kitchen gets lots of sunlight and is the homes natural gathering point. The outdoor terrace through the kitchen side door is ideal for brunch, coffee or simply relaxing while enjoying the view. The bathroom has been recently remodeled and has new classic fixtures with new ceramic tile on the floors and walls. There are also a full size washer and dryer New double pane windows through out keep the house warm and quite. The setting is private with many birds and trees for neighbors. There are shops with just about everything including a bakery, cafe, grocery store, hardware and gas station within walking distance a few blocks away. The AC transit bus stop on the corner that links to Bart provides good public transportation options. Award winning public schools, exceptional police and fire protection and friendly small town feel are hallmarks of life here. The location is quiet with lots of trees yet close to UCB and Solano Ave shops. One queen and one double bed currently occupy two of the three bedrooms. The third bedroom has a day bed and currently used as a office although is would be a fine media or guest room. The home is fully equipped with a washer, dryer, stove, oven, microwave, dishwasher, garbage disposal, TV, DVD, High speed Internet. Available July 14, 2013 with first month rent and deposit. Please call or respond to this post and I will get back with you right away. Thanks so much for your interest. Best regards, Gawain PS no pets please 510 847 9554 You can also book the place on line at: Located north of the University of California Berkeley campus on the Berkeley-Kensington Border, this unique Arlington Ave. property offers hospitality with beauty, charm and comfort. This Traditional Mediterranean is well situated on the tree lined Arlington Ave. in the town of Kensington. Quiet and peaceful, the hills setting provides Bay and wooded views, open space and wildlife. So close to city life just 5 min South yet Greenery and privacy are the hallmarks of life here on the hill. Great restaurants from Cheese Board Pizza at 2 bucks a slice to Alice Waters Chez Panisse. A short walk will bring you to The Arlington Cafe and The Kensington Inn (for great breakfasts), Youngs Market (grocery and basic household needs) . The old fashioned 20s era pharmacy on the corner has its own US Postal Service walk-up counter just like the old days. The Arlington Ace Hardware, pet store and wine shop are just a few more of the local shops at the Kensington Village just a few blocks from the House. A neighborhood walk offers canyon and Bay views through great Monterey Pine and majestic California Oaks. Enjoy biking, hiking and swimming at Tilden Regional Park just up the road. A running track, park and tennis courts are located behind the Public Library just 3 blocks away. Activities within an hours drive: West to Marin Countys Muir Woods, Mt. Tamalpais, and Pt. Reyes; or head south for Big Sur. Explore further north to Napa/Sonoma wine country, or east to Yosemite, Lake Tahoe, or the Sierra Mountains. Of course, San Franciscos culture, diversity, history, food, shopping, museums, opera, symphony, and ball park are just across the Bay Bridge or a Bart ride away. Dont forget Golden Gate Park, Strybing Gardens, the beach, the Golden Gate Bridge, Marin Headlands, Sausalito, and Tiburon.

post: This great totally renovated 4BR 3BA single family home with very large sunny south facing garden is flooded with natural light. The kitchen has a beautiful open plan featuring granite counters, eat-in island which accommodates 4 stools, and stainless steel appliances including French door refrigerator. There is a separate bar area with bar sink and built-in Vinotemp wine cooler. Fabulous large, high ceiling combination living/dining room with bay window and glass door which opens to a sunny deck that directly accesses the large beautifully landscaped south-facing sunny garden paved with bricks. There are two good-sized bedrooms which have attractive windows with window seats and large closets. The third bedroom on this level has a window and glass door that opens to a west-facing tiled inside deck. One bathroom boasts beige marble and has a large shower with seat. The second bathroom on the main floor has a tub, separate shower, and black granite and white tile. Hardwood stairs lead down to the master bedroom suite which has a large walk-in closet. This suite has a bay window and glass door that open directly to the south-facing garden. The master bathroom has a spacious shower with seat and is appointed with beige marble. There is also a functional laundry room facing the garden with ample cabinets and sink on this level. The garage is quite large and could easily accommodate at least 2 cars plus storage. There is great attention to detail throughout, such as crown mouldings, elegant satin nickel door knobs, and blind-nailed hardwood floors with walnut feature strip. Additional features include: Skylights Alarm system Irrigation system in garden Separate temperature control for master bedroom suite Automatic garage door opener Sorry no pets This home is located on Bay and Broderick and is within a few blocks of the Palace of Fine Arts, Chestnut Street, San Francisco Bay, and the express bus to downtown. head: VERY SPACIOUS Studio, Quiet, Res. Parking, Huge Closet
post: This is a delightful, large Studio apartment with high, wood-beamed vaulted ceilings ideal for an individual who seeks a quiet, hassle free space. It has a small side room where a double bed (or office set up) can fit nicely adjacent to the large living room. The closet is extra large with big mirrored doors. This unit is in a very quiet apartment complex on the end of one of our 5 buildings. Additionally, a reserved carport parking space is near the front door. It will be available in late June or early July. These units are usually rented by the first person to see them because they are very charming and this is a wonderful place to live. A 4 washer 4 dryer coin laundry facility is on-site. Water (plus hot water) & garbage are paid utilities. Relatively good credit is required. We arent able to accept Section 8 or dogs. This is a non-smoking complex. We are located approximately 10-12 minutes from Orinda and El Cerrito, about 30 minutes from San Francisco (19 miles to SFMOMA) and about 20 minutes from Larkspur, San Rafael and Berkeley Bowl West. Trader Joes in Pinole is 5 minutes away. This is a very convenient location to all of the Bay Area. VIEWING SCHEDULE (see directions below): ...... SUNDAY (6/16/13) from 12:30pm to 1pm. Email this ad to find out about other viewing times. The best thing to do is to show up for this first viewing on Sunday if you can. You can also email appianrentals at gmail. LOCATION of the Manager is 4483 Appian Way, Apt. B, in the longest building (third from the street - by the mailboxes and laundry room). See directions below. We are 5-7 minutes from the Richmond Parkway at the Hilltop intersection. We are about 15 minutes from Orinda as well as 10 minutes from El Cerrito. San Franciscos SFMOMA is about 17 miles from this location. Berkeley Bowl West and Trader Joes Pinole are just minutes away. DIRECTIONS: From the Hilltop Road exit on Hwy 80, go away from the bay to La Paloma. Turn right on La Paloma and go one block down the hill to where it ends on Appian Way. Turn right on Appian Way and we are the first complex on the right (white, two level buildings with blue trim). Drive through the breezeways of the first two buildings and park by the laundry room or by the lawn. The Manager is in the first 4483 building, Apt. B by the laundry room. We are about 3 blocks from San Pablo Dam Road.

head: Ground floor, end unit.  1x1+Den - Available 7/1/2013
Old Town Sausalito apartment (utils included)
post: Highlights here. Please read on for more detail. Pics to be added soon, and possible viewing opportunity this coming Sunday. + Nice location walkable to downtown, neighborhood market and public transport + One off-street parking space + Access to garden with nice SF view + Gas, electric and water service included + Access to on-site washer and dryer + Initial one-year lease term, but preference for someone planning longer term + Pets welcome + Should be available end of June, as some improvements are completed This is a ground-floor unit with private entrance in a older, detached Sausalito house. It is situated below an occupied upper apartment, so some tolerance for footfall noise from above at times is necessary. Offers cozy bedrooms, separate large shared closet/storage space, updated galley kitchen, dining/office space opening onto semi-private garden patio. The location is a great hillside spot offering panoramic San Francisco city and Bay and Alcatraz views and a safe/easy walk to downtown. Bus and ferry rendezvous points and the Golden Gate Bridge are just minutes away. One off-street parking space is provided, and on-street parking for guests and visitors is typically easy to come by. Access to washer/dryer and to garden with city views is shared with occupants of upper unit. Immediately adjacent to the house is a city park with tennis and basketball courts and dog run. Well-behaved pets are more than welcome (no extra charge, but might be factored into deposit). Gas, electric and water service are included in the monthly rent. Prospective tenants are simply asked to be respectful and responsible folks. That has been the general pattern with the long line of previous occupants, most of whom have departed as friends. Standard first and last months rent, along with approximate $1000 deposit, required. Proof of credit worthiness and personal references might also be requested. Please email to above address for more information, taking a line or two to tell us about yourself. Thanks for your interest and good luck with your search.

It is centrally located with affordable rents. The blocks closest to Market Street tend to be gritty with a fair share of homeless. However, the rest of the area has some nice pockets, with the best being closest to Nob Hill. Overall, the neighborhood is well located in SF and its popular among art students since you can find decent studios for reasonable prices. head: Great Remodeled Studio : Special Terms /Seeking Building Manager
post: $1,795 per month, 0 bedrooms, 1 full baths, 0 half baths, 0 square feet You will be living in a remodeled studio apartment on-site and will be provided with all necessary supplies for jobs, but not tools. You will be responsible for the day-to-day maintenance of 14 residential units, the common areas, and exterior of the premises. In addition, you will need to take on small projects to help our crew finish renovations in a timely manner. You will be signing a lease for $1,795 a month for the apartment. You will pay rent each month for your apartment. At the end of each month you will receive a check for your management services for $600. Tenants from the building will not directly contact you for maintenance issues, but instead report all issues to the management company. The management company will then contact you for appropriate repairs. If the repair is beyond your scope of work, our maintenance staff will take care of the issue. This is not an employment position. You will be acting as an independent contractor. As such, you will be responsible for your own scheduling, provision of any necessary tools, etc. You will be paid a monthly fee for your services. As an independent contractor, you will be responsible for your own income reporting and you will not be entitled to unemployment benefits should the contract be terminated. head: Lovely 3 Bedroom Victorian flat in great neighborhood
post: We are looking to rent the upper flat of our house to either a family, or 2 to 3 mellow, positive-natured people starting July 1st (or a bit later). Rent is $2,200, all utilities & wireless internet included. Rent & utility price is based on 2 people, $100 for each additional. First month, last month & security deposit needed to move in. The house is a beautiful Victorian with 3 bedrooms, one bathroom (with bathtub), living room, dining room, kitchen, nice back deck, with shared attic storage, shared back yard with fire pit, BBQ and vegetable garden, and shared washer/dryer. Were on 16th street between West and Brush. Its a great neighborhood on the border of Downtown & West Oakland with a park & school on the block. Its about a 10 minute walk to the 12th Street/Downtown Oakland Bart. Absolutely no cats allowed and no large or medium dogs. We would consider one small dog if they are well trained, do not bark all the time, and get along with other dogs as we have 2 sweet Boston Terriers.

head: BRAND NEW REMODEL :  Beautiful Spacious TOP Floor 1Br, Hrdwd floor
post: BRAND NEW REMODEL : Beautiful Spacious TOP Floor Unique 1Br, Hrdwd floors Nob Hill 1 BR -- ** BRAND NEW REMODEL : New EVERYTHING ! Beautiful Bright Apt** Beautiful corner building with ornamental Lobby and GRAND Oval Spiral Staircase *** $2,950/month Available for Immediate Occupancy Now**** Shown by appointment Please send us email or call 415-271-2770 for appointment to view this beautiful apartment. Please use the following link to find a few photos of the apartment: A little about the building : We have an absolutely beautiful Lobby Entrance with Security Gate and Modern Intercom with a GRAND Oval Spiral staircase and a stained glass skylight A lot more about the apartment : We will gradually spiral our way up the Grand Oval staircase to the 3rd floor (TOP floor) and go the WEST hallway. Open the front door and you will be greeted by light, color, and shiny newly sanded and stained hardwood floors. To your LEFT is a separate room with 3 closets and a bay windows. To your immediate RIGHT is the bathroom w tub and overhead shower (NEW toilet, NEW vanity, NEW fixtures). To your further RIGHT is another separate room with 1 closet, and adjacent to this room is the GORGEOUS Kitchen ! Lets start with the NEW REMODELED KITCHEN : New granite counter tops, New wood cabinets throughout, New fixtures, New DISHWASHER, New GAS STOVE and fume hood and NEW Large refrigerator. New double-paned windows (quiet and insulated), light fixtures and vinyl flooring and LOTS of storage space in the curved PANTRY for the Trader Joe or Costco things ! Now lets go back into the LIVING ROOM and BEDROOM --- The Living Room is bright and warm with large NE exposure windows (NEW double paned windows, quiet and insulated). Beautiful Hardwood Floor throughout with inlay wood design. High ceilings with ornamental stucco desings, and NEW beautiful chandeliers. The living room has one large closet. The Bedroom is private and separated from the LR and is spacious, with 3 good sized closets and new double-paned vinyl bay windows (quiet and insulated) facing W on the top floor of the building. Now lets walk over to the BATHROOM : There is a Large and beautiful bathtub and overhead shower. NEW toilet, vanity, medicine cabinets, AND fixtures. Hardwood floors in living room, bed room and closets. There are lots of closets (did I already mention that ?). There are radiators for heat in the living areas. Internet and TV Cable wired; tenant pays subscription. Utilities: Included in Rent are Heat, Hot and Cold water and garbage. PGE to be paid by tenant. No Laundry in the building, but several Laundromats and dry cleaners within a few steps. Please send us email or call 415-271-2770 for appointment to view this beautiful apartment. A little about the location : This beautiful building is one block from the California Street buses and Cable car line. We are only 2 Blocks to the Polk and Van Ness corridor restaurants, bars, clubs, and business. TRADER JOES (Yes !) around the block on Hyde St. And of course, we are only few blocks from Grace Cathedral, Huntington Park, and the major Nob Hill Hotels such as Fairmont, Ritz Carlton, Mark Hopkins. Chinatown, Financial District, Ferry Building, Union Square are close and within walking distance. Now let me tell you about Parking : We dont have parking in the building. For those of you who are new, the City will issue a C-permit with your lease agreement which lets you bypass the 2 hour limit signs (exception of Street Cleaning days/times and No Parking Any Time). Developing good parking karma will happen with time, patience, and experience (watching Kung Fu Panda part 1 will help). For anyone with expensive cars or working variable hours, there is paid public parking next door. There are also several parking garages within 1 to 2 blocks. Our pet policy: A cat may be possible with additional $15/m and fees, and excellent references  We do not allow any other pets in the building. A little bit about yourself : We LOVE interesting people with wonderful life stories. Please be a NON-smoker with a stable job, good income, good credit, good references, good rental history with No Evictions. We have our own application process and there is a $25 fee per applicant . This apartment is most suitable for One ( or 2 persons, if you have a wonderful room mate; he/she will also need to complete a separate application, as mentioned above. ** Please email us OR call 415-271-2770 to schedule appointment

head: My boss cuts off a finger if I knock $100 off. Call me 1-finger Teresa
post: Its a buyers market, and my boss swore pigs would fly before he lowered the rents on his prize apartment community even though we had vacancies up the gazoo just a couple months ago. I cut those rents till we had a queue of drooling prospects hanging out of our door waving checks.  Weve got just a few of those giveaway-priced, stunning apartment homes left.  You can save hundreds (yes, thats plural) of dollars a month over other comparable apartment communities in our area.  That could be an extra car payment, or a family vacation!  We offer the ultimate in comfort and elegance, well-appointed with wood-burning fireplaces, walk-in closets and spacious floorplans.  Stunning landscaping includes fountains, bridges, & lakes, and beautiful Laurel Creek Park is across the street.  The manicured common areas have a sparkling pool, heated spa, and clubhouse with fitness equipment. Theres an on-site laundry facility, but many units have washer/dryer hookups. Conveniently close to the I-80 freeway, good neighbors, attentive management, and a great location in a primarily single family residential area near schools and shopping.  Look at the pictures on their website and youll see what an incredible deal youre getting!  And when you visit us, pay no attention to the overhead swarm of flying pigs.  Theyre perfectly harmless.  Call 707-428-3465 to schedule a tour. Bring your umbrella and your skillet (for the flying bacon). Please mention Ad Code MV34 and check out: *No section 8*

head: your own apartment as part of a spiritual intentional community
post: Welcome to Dancing Spirits! Heres our story: We know the new owner of a beautiful mansion in Berkeley. The mansion is being renovated and will be ready by September 1st. There are 5 of us ready to live there. We need 10 more people to join us! THE HOUSE built in 1890 15 rooms 1 full kitchen plus 2 kitchenettes 4.5 bathrooms (will be 6 in 1-2 years) huge back, side, and front yard - we will grow some of our own food and there will most likely be a sauna and hot tub out there! lots of trees huge huge kitchen designated room for spiritual practice (meditation, yoga, Zikr, shamanic work - whatever the community members use it for along those lines). huge living room 6 other common areas throughout the house Separate apartment by the yard There are photos on our facebook page - search under Dancing Spirits Community House. THE APARTMENT: attached to the house but has its own entrance, its own kitchen, its own bathroom. Its quiet with a lovely loft style bedroom upstairs. Lots of trees around it. THE COMMUNITY in the process of forming moving in September 1st but need commitments July 1st shared leadership teams take care of each aspect of the house so far really amazing people! (Vicki: in her 50s, Spiritual atheist but believes in the unseen world, great vegan cook, meditator; Jenyae: in her 20s, shamanic, meditator, yoga, earth based connection; Jeni: in her 20s, meditator, Buddhist witch; Kathy: in her 40s, created most of the documents and is the communitys mentor but probably wont live at the house for awhile, shamanic practitioner, musician; Mary: in her early 30s, our newest member, visionary; Tiana: in her 30s, working toward becoming a medium, spiritualist, model Our Core Values: building human connection and peace through nonviolent communication (ala Rosenberg), shared meals (at least 2x a week but its up to the community), and shared spiritual practice. Communicating directly and in person especially when its hard. Honoring spiritual diversity. embodying spiritual diversity by practicing together under the rotating leadership so we experience each others traditions and practices. radical self responsibility (owning our emotions and projections, always striving for consciousness). COST The apartment is $1600. Utilities will probably be about $50 per person per month but we wont know until next month and really until we start living there. LEASING OPTIONS 18 month lease option means you only have to give one months notice if you fulfill the lease, 3 months notice if you break the lease unless you find someone to fill your spot. $100 off first months rent. Month to month option means you give 3 months notice. Rent is discounted $50 in any month where you offer at least 4 hours of work to the community in that month, either planning an event or doing extra planting in the garden. Deposit: 1.5 months rent plus $100 pet deposit PETS: We already have 3 dogs so there is room for 2 more in the main house and 2 can be in the apartment. (or it could be cats or whatever). Pet owners must pick up their pets waste outside as the yard will also be sacred space. YOU! If youre a visionary and want to help create this community, if you are spiritual, if you are creative, if you can communicate even when its difficult, if you are awake, write me! Please reference some aspect of this ad when you email me. Generic responses will be ignored. There are rooms available and the move-in date is September 1st. We cant wait to meet you!

Inc. for showing times. 415-386-6657 x104 Amenities Hardwood Floor Walk In Closet Additional Photos $2,650 /month Contact Debra Malta 415-386-6657 x104 Map About Russian Hill Russian Hill is an upscale neighborhood with many distinct characteristics. Its most popular attraction is Lombard Street, which is known as the crookedest street in the world due to its seven sharp turns. Similarly, many of the sidewalks are stairways due to the steepness of the streets of this neighborhood. Russian Hill does have a lot of popular restaurants and shops down Hyde Street, and is nearby North Beach, which has even more shops. With significantly less crime than other areas of San Francisco, Russian Hill is a great place to live.

head: 1920's 2bd, hardwoods, 1 block to Lakeshore, openhouse thurs@6,
post: The first open house will be on Thursday June 13th at 6:00pm. Please meet Mike outside. 510-377-2904 468 Stow avenue #5. $1595. Rent. 2bd 1 bath 1920s Bldg. 2nd of 3 floors with a view of Lake Merritt which is 1 block away at Lakeshore ave. Two leveled unit with rebuilt kitchen and hardwood floors in the living room and hallway. Move in costs are a $1000 deposit plus prorated rent from when you move in. It is available as early as July 1st. 12 unit 1920s three story building. This is a two-bedroom one-bath apartment. There are very nice hardwood floors in this apartment. The bedrooms and the bathroom are up a short flight of stairs.The kitchen and living room are on the first level. Separate eat in kitchen.Two tone painted plaster walls with white trim, with interesting coved ceilings, new light fixtures, double hung windows, new countertops, Maple Cabinets, sink and faucet, gas stove and bay window. Washer and dryer in the building. This is as very cute unit. If you like older buildings with style this is the place for you. Friendly neighbors. electric heat . We do not allow dogs. In the picture of the front this unit is on the 2nd floor on the right. Parking is on the street. We pay for water hot water and garbage. The lease is one year which turns into a month to month lease. Oakland has rent control. The unit faces north towards the lake and it gets afternoon sun from the west. We will have applications at the open house. If you have something put together already you can put it with our application in case yours doesnt have something that ours needs. We do need to run a credit check through Natinonal Tenant Network and that will cost $15 per adult. There is no other application fee. We would like to have a check for the fee since we do not carry change while showing apartments. We take applications and then choose based mainly on income and credit, so it isnt a first come first serve thing, so dont stress. Our application asks for the addresses and contact info for the last three apartments, employment info and contacts, other forms of income, large loan payment basic info such as car loans, your phone number and email, the move in date that you are looking for etc. This is just in case you want to save some time for yourself and have these things ready with copies that you can drop off at whatever open house you go to. The open house is at 6:00. Please meet Mike outside. The extra deposit for one cat is $200. We are one block to lake Merritt on the south side of the lake off of Lakeshore Avenue. From the 580 take Lakeshore west towards the bay, pass Brookland turn left on the next street, ( this is just after the large apartment building on lakeshore called the Peacock) From Wayne turn left on Stow, it is half way down the block. This building is a short walk to the Grandlake theater, Lakeshore and Grand ave shopping, transbay bus lines, Carpool ride sharing, the Farmers market, one block to the leaning tower of pizza restaurant and a few blocks to the Parkway theater and the Lake Merritt cafe ect. This is a less dense neighborhood than Adams point and has a more neighborhood feel to it.

post: Beautiful 2,600 Sqft. 4 bedroom, 3.5 bathroom home on a private drive. This home is very spacious and features a formal living room and dining room with a wet bar, a large family room with a fireplace, a breakfast nook adjacent to the kitchen, and a deck with views of the hills. The kitchen has tile countertops, a garden box window, a full pantry, raised oven, an electric cook top, and a side-by-side refrigerator/freezer. The first floor also has a half bathroom, a big storage closet, and access to the three-car garage. Up the grand staircase near the entryway are all of the bedrooms and a laundry room with washer/dryerhookups. Each bedroom has access to an en-suite bath. Two of the rooms share a Jack and Jill bathroom, while the third bedroom and master bedroom both have private en-suite bathrooms. The master bedroom features a fireplace, his and her walk-in closets, and a spacious en-suite bath with a deep soaking tub, separate shower, and dual sinks. Within a block of the home is a private park with benches, a large grass field, and a play structure. This home is located within minutes of highway 80 and 580, and very close to Wildcat Canyon Regional Park, the San Pablo Reservoir, and many areas with shopping and restaurants. Tenant is responsible for all utilities. $2600 rent +$2600 deposit and a 12 month lease is required. Please call (510)774-1114 to view. Property is located on Debra Lane if you would like to drive around the area before viewing.

head: Open House!!! Spacious One Bedroom (PICS)
post: We will be having an Open House this Friday 5-7PM and Saturday 11AM-1PM. Summit Apartments combines oversized apartment homes with a peaceful setting near the heart of Hayward. Our one and two bedroom floor plans include spacious kitchens with separate dining areas, upgraded bathrooms with cultured marble tub enclosures, and large bedrooms with generous closet space. The community features a privately located swimming pool, a separate BBQ and picnic area, three on-site laundry facilities, covered parking, controlled access and elevator service. head: Extraordinary house with amazing views, 4-bed 3-ba, pets nego, garage
post: The house is on a double lot on a cul-de-sac in upper Cole Valley. The main level features bridge-to-bridge views upon entry. There is a large living room with a wood burning fireplace, and a large deck which leads down to a backyard. The kitchen is remodeled, and there is a dining room. The upper level has the same amazing views and features 3 bedrooms and 2 remodeled bathrooms, including a master bedroom and slate master bathroom with a soaking tub. The master bedroom has its own sun room which can be used as an office, as well as a south-facing deck. The other 2 bedrooms are separated by sliding door. The lower level features a large family room which opens to a large deck and leads to the backyard. There is also 1 bedroom or office and 1 bathroom on this level, as well as a laundry room. The location is quiet and secluded, but is still quite central with easy and quick access to shopping and dining hotspots in various neighborhoods. Shops and restaurants in Cole Valley and in Inner Sunset are within a quick drive via Clarendon Ave. The southbound and eastbound freeways are easily accessible via OShaughnessy Blvd to the 280 freeway. Also very close by are Twin Peaks and the Mount Sutro Open Space Preserve. Will be available in the middle of July. The house has a 2-car side-by-side garage, also with extra storage space. Pets are negotiable. The minimum lease term is 12 months. The house comes unfurnished. Mazal Bordo Relocation Agent 415 309 5667

The living room has a fireplace, and there is good closet space throughout. The location is one block away from shops and restaurants on and around Castro and 18th Streets. It is also one block away from major public transportation lines on Market Street, providing for quick and easy access to Downtown and the Financial District. There is also easy access to all the southbound and eastbound freeways. Parking is available for an additional $250 per month. Pets are ok. The building has an on-site common laundry facility. Water and waste utility services are included. The minimum lease term is 12 months. Mazal Bordo Relocation Agent 415 309 5667

Picture yourself relaxing near the tranquil pool, or dangling your tired feet in the bubbly Jacuzzi after a hard days work. . . Think about strolling hand-in-hand across the footbridge, overlooking a beautiful lagoon. . . Our spacious 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom apartments feature central heat and air, fireplaces, patios or balconies (with killer views), carpeting, and kitchens complete with a dishwasher and fridge. Youll also enjoy the convenience of covered parking, on-site laundry facilities and some paid utilities (water, sewer, garbage). Now that youre feeling well rested, you might enjoy a jaunt in Laurel Creek Park, which happens to be right across the street. With a Walking Score of 97, this unit is steps from The Presidio Golf Club, Presidio tennis courts and hiking trails, as well as the restaurants and boutiques of Sacramento Street. It is also close to public transportation and Silicon Valley shuttle stops. Skylights through-out the condo let in the natural light for a bright and cheery ambiance. Great period detail throughout makes this Edwardian condo a great place to stay and call home in San Franciscos desirable Presidio Heights.  Other features include: In-unit laundry washer & dryer 1 car parking in private garage Water and garbage costs included Cable-ready This is truly San Francisco living at its finest. ..
